text: Four years ago, Tyreek Hill pleaded guilty to domestic assault and battery by strangulation. If his history of domestic violence has repeated itself, Hill's time with the Chiefs has to end here.
author: ColleenMNelson

text: Tyreek Hill is one of the best wide receivers in the NFL, but if he broke his son’s arm, the Kansas City Chiefs must break it off with their star.  https://www.kansascity.com/opinion/editorials/article228014084.html …
author: ColleenMNelson

text: During a grim week of cheating and bribery in higher education, we all could use a lot more of George P. Smith, the Nobel Prize-winning Mizzou professor who is donating his winnings to start a scholarship fund.
author: ColleenMNelson
